remarks: Lemma for ~ dia2dim .  Eliminate auxiliary translations ` G ` and ` D ` .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia2dimlem6.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem6.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.

dia2dimlem6.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem6.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem6.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.

dia2dimlem6.q $e |- Q = ( ( P .\/ U ) ./\ ( ( F ` P ) .\/ V ) ) $.

dia2dimlem6.rv $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) =/= V ) $.
dia2dimlem6 $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( I ` U ) .(+) ( I ` V ) ) ) $.
